Usage:
  slc loopback:bluemix [options]

Options:
  -h,   --help          # Print the generator's options and usage
        --skip-cache    # Do not remember prompt answers             Default: false
        --skip-install  # Do not automatically install dependencies  Default: false
        --toolchain     # Set up Bluemix toolchain
        --docker        # Generate Dockerfile
        --manifest      # Generate Bluemix manifest file
        --datasource    # Add Bluemix data-source
        --service       # Add Bluemix service

Description:
  `toolchain`, `manifest`, and `docker` are scaffold options. Not specifying any of them is interpreted as
  specifying all of them.

  Specify the `datasource` option to add a datasource which is already provisioned on Bluemix.
